Laundry Equipment

Washers and gas dryers overview

📖 Manual 🛠 Parts 🚨 Troubleshooting

Washer Checklist

  • Inspect door seals and hinges weekly
  • Clean drain pump filter monthly
  • Check suspension and shocks quarterly
  • Verify water inlet screens

Gas Dryer Checklist

  • Clean lint traps daily
  • Inspect venting and airflow monthly
  • Check igniter and flame sensor
  • Verify drum belt and rollers

Troubleshooting

Washer Won't Drain
  • Clean drain filter
  • Check drain hose for kinks
  • Test drain pump
Dryer No Heat
  • Check igniter continuity
  • Test flame sensor
  • Verify gas supply and coils

Wiring Diagram
